title: J Crew Serif?
content:
Hello,

I'm sure this is a custom logotype, but, I assume it is just a typeface tweaked a bit.  
Any ideas of what it might've started as?  
I can find some close ones, the problem is, most of the fonts I'm finding don't have a version as light as this.  
Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228184635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jcrew_5714.jpg)
author: mpayson
